item.title: Joe Caroff, Designer of the James Bond 007 Logo, Dies at 103
item.description: He also worked on iconic posters for ‘West Side Story,’ ‘A Hard Day’s Night,’ ‘Last Tango in Paris,’ ‘Cabaret,’ ‘Manhattan’ and ‘The Last Temptation of Christ.’
